# method

**Instance Property**

The interpolation method for resizing.

## Declaration

```swift
var method: BNNSInterpolationMethod
```

## Instance Properties

- **i_desc**: The descriptor of the input.
- **o_desc**: The descriptor of the output.
- **align_corners**: A Boolean value that specifies whether to align the corners of the upscaling grid to the center of scaling dimensions instead of to the edges.

items.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether to align the corners of the upscaling grid to the center of scaling dimensions instead of to the edges.
